TEXT.TITLE: HONEYWELL INC <HON> 1ST QTR OPER NET
TEXT.BODY: Oper shr 96 cts vs 79 cts Oper net 43.7 mln vs 36.4 mln Sales 1.48 billion vs 1.15 billion NOTE: 1987 sales includes operations of Sperry Aerospace. 1986 operating net excludes a charge from discontinued operations of 10.2 mln dlrs or 22 cts a share. Reuter
